name: Free Food For Fox
description:
Small update: Fixed some bugs, tightened up some graphics and rock gameplay, and added some music by https://lanatovarisch.itch.io/. If you want to see how the game was when the jam ended, download the old Game Boy rom file below.

----------

I made this roughly 5-6 hours before the deadline for the Foxie Game Jam. It's not polished and I didn't have enough time to put all the content in but it was interesting to see what i could do in such a short time.

Made in GB Studio.

Anyway, find a picnic and steal it.

Interact with the basket and rocks to push them. Interact with the basket when you reach the goal to go the next area. (also the picnic basket takes up less vertical space than it looks)

Controls:

Arrows - move
Z - interact
Shift - reset scene
